name: Icy Spring
description:
In Icy Spring, you will become an ice guy and explore a spring-themed garden!

  

Use your ice bomb to freeze eater plants, moving spikes and platforms.

There are 3 optional collectibles, which are very challenging to get.

Try it if you are an expert at platformer games!
